name: Animated top down snail game asset
name_original: Animated top down snail game asset
description: Collection of top down animated snail game sprites. six fully animated colour variations. animations come as hd png keyframes with each pink 637 pixels in height. The file also includes a fully rigged spriter file which you can use to create more animations or reexport animations to spritesheets or keyframes in higher or lower resolution. Export to upto 2000 pixels without losing resolution.
